metadata.title: CVE-2017-15873 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The get_next_block function in archival/libarchive/decompress_bunzip2.c inBusyBox 1.27.2 has an Integer Overflow that may lead to a write accessviolation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15873` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
busybox-static - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
udhcpc - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
udhcpd - 1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.27.2-1ubuntu4').
